text: My Postgraduation from Trinity College Dublin in 2024.

Certified exploration of theoretical and practical aspects of LLMs, Generative AI and RAG systems. Also explored the ethics and concerns surrounding the use of GenAI systems. Gained certificates can be viewed here [1].
Concluded the implementation of a personal chatbot named A.L.F.R.E.D. [1] at the end of my portfolio website to provide human-like responses to queries about my professional background.
